tests.description: Number('') convert to Number by explicit transformation

Compare Number('.12345e6') with +('12345')*1e1,
and Number('.12345e-3') !== Number('12345')*1e-8

Compare Number('12345e6') with +('12345')*1e1,
and Number('12345e-6') !== Number('12345')*1e-6
Strings with various WhiteSpaces convert to Number by explicit transformation
Compare Number('0xA'), Number('0XA'), Number('0xa') and Number('0Xa') with 10
Compare Number('0xB'), Number('0XB'), Number('0xb') and Number('0Xb') with 11
Compare Number('0xC'), Number('0XC'), Number('0xc') and Number('0Xc') with 12
Compare Number('0xD'), Number('0XD'), Number('0xd') and Number('0Xd') with 13
Compare Number('0xE'), Number('0XE'), Number('0xe') and Number('0Xe') with 14
Compare Number('0xF'), Number('0XF'), Number('0xf') and Number('0Xf') with 15
Use various long numbers, for example, 1234567890.1234567890
Compare Number('Infinity') with Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY, 10e10000, 10E10000 and Number("10e10000")
Compare Number('Infi'+'nity') with Number.POSITIVE_INFINITY, 10e10000, 10E10000 and Number("10e10000")
Compare Number('1234e5') and Number('1234.e5') with Number('1234')*1e5
